mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, CRE_DATE FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, B.TITLE AS TITLE, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, B.CRE_DATE AS CRE_DATE FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO) WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, M.NICKNAME, B.CRE_DATE, B.MOD_DATE FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT B.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS, B.TITLE AS TITLE, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME FROM BOARD B, MEMBERS M WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO) WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or contents LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or nickname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%';
